body.name: Sweetcrispy Small Office Desk Chair with Wheels Armless Comfy Computer Chair with Lumbar Support, PU Leather Low Back Adjustable Height 360° Rolling Swivel Task Chair Without Arm for Home, Bedroom
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 10 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【COMFORTABLE THICK CUSHION】The cushion and backrest of this rolling office chair are made of high-density foam cushion, which is not only comfortable but also has high resilience. The surface of the seat is covered by PU leather, and the vertical pattern design makes it possible to maintain air circulation and not stuffy sweat even after a long time sitting;

【FLEXIBLE DESIGN FOR SMALL SPACE】 The cute small low back office chair is designed to use a more flexible, 360 ° swivel rotatable task chair to move more freely; adjustable height computer chairs are suitable for more small spaces, such as bedrooms, study rooms, nail salons, vanity dressing rooms！

【STURDY AND DURABLE OFFICE CHAIR】 This PU leather armless desk chair for teens and adult is made up of high-quality padded foam cushion, U-shaped lumbar support, sturdy base (maximum load capacity 250lbs) , and upgraded cylinders are certified by SGS, This office chair is BIFMA certified, and factory tested over 10,000 times to ensure your safety while sitting on our desk chair!

【HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE & 360° MOVEMENT】This PU leather computer desk chair with height adjustable function, you can customize the height (17.71"-21.45"), suitable for different heights of desks; This 360° swivel chair comes with smooth casters. This 360° swivel chair with smooth casters glides quietly and smoothly without harming the floor.

【QUICK AND EASY ASSEMBLY】We have prepared an installation video and installation manual for this office chair, as well as the accessories needed for installation; according to the instructions you can finish the installation in 5-10 minutes. If you encounter any questions, please feel free to contact us, we are very happy to provide you with satisfactory solutions!

what is the height from the floor to the top of the cushion seat when the chair is in the lowest position? This height adjustable office chair measures 17.71"-21.45" from the floor to the top of the cushion. what is the weight capacity of this home office desk chair? The maximum load capacity of this small desk chair is 250lbs What is the seating depth of a home office computer desk chair? The cushion seat depth of this home office chair is 17.51" what is the projected lifespan of this small home office chair? Normal and not overloaded use of this small office chair can last about 2 years Is this armless office chair complicated to install? The installation of this office chair is very simple with only 6 steps; you can finish the installation in 5-10 minutes according to the installation manual or then the installation video!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: good , came packaged in box and wrapped in plastic ,seat is good foam and back rest is not flimsy ,it is easy to put together with supplied tool and bolts ,also has a few spare bolts incase you loose one . i will say it rolls nice and seems to be good quality ,its not as big and cumbersome as my office desk and thats what i was looking for ,i would recommend if your looking for a nice chair ,and the price is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price and functionability
reviews.reviewText: I thought it was gonna be cheap but was pleasantly surprised. Not high line of course given the price point but is light weight and works great. Easy to assemble. Easy directions. Took longer to unwrap all the parts than to set up. Sits very comfortable for what I need. Just sitting at computer. Adjust up n down easily. Very good basic task chair. I am pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, smaller chair
reviews.reviewText: I needed a smaller chair for my office that I could use to scoot between my work and personal desks and this fit the bill perfectly. It's small, but comfortable and fits under a desk nicely. It took about 15 minutes to assemble and the instructions were simple and clear. The allen wrench tool supplied is quite nice with a large comfortable handle so you can get some nice torque in the screws. The manufacturer also supplied a couple of extra parts, just in case! I'm very satisfied with this chair at an excellent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall great chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is well-made and has easy-to-read assembly instructions. The cushions are soft and the chair is sturdy. I didn't give it a 5-star review because the color is not white, more of a cream. I was expecting and wanted white like the product pictures, but the cream will have to do. If you want a true white this chair isn't for you. I placed the white paper on the chair to show the color difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We couldn't be more pleased with this chair. I is very comfortable and well made. Assembly was easy, and they even included a tool to do it with. The quality of the chair is super. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond exceeding expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair mostly for its color; I love the orange hue of the brown and have two other chairs that look similar, a bit bigger, and 2x the price. This chair is half the price of my previous and it is more comfortable, more durable, has smoother rolling, more padding, and much higher quality fabric. I love this chair so much; as soon as I sit down on it, I feel all the pressure on my bottom go away.I sew for hours straight and I get up feeling so much better than any other chair I've used to work with before. The back rest meets perfectly to the center of my back (I'm 5'4) and feels secure and comfortable when I lean back in it. My husband is also around 260lbs and 6'4 and feels just as comfortable in the chair as I do. If you need this chair for the weight capacity, I think it definitely carries quite a bit more than 300lbs.I didn't check the size of the chair before buying but the size is much shorter than a typical desk chair and fits perfectly in my small cubby desk. So this chair will save you a lot of space and pain in the a**!Finally, the assembly was so incredibly easy and of all at-home-assembled furniture I've bought, the allen-key wrench is also the best I've ever used. It makes it so easy to turn the screws and doesn't hurt your hurts like many others.I wish I had bought these chairs instead of my previous; if you were thinking of buying this, here is your confirmation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, color not true to pic
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a great computer chair…very comfortable, looks nice and I love the black legs. Glides nicely and easy to assemble . The only reason I gave it three stars is because I bought it in beige white, and it looks more like a tan cream to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Quality Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair exceeded my expectations. The frame and legs are sturdy; it appears they are made of steel. The chair seat and back are extremely comfortable. It will be easy to keep clean with a damp cloth. The instructions were simple and concise. The only help I needed was pushing the castor wheels onto the legs, which my husband did very easily. This was a great price for the quality of the chair. No tools were needed for assembly; a sturdy Allen wrench was included with extra hardware. I highly recommend this chair. I am very pleased with it.
